1.name: Arming Sword
1.description: Standard weapon for the guards. quick attack, moderate damage.

2.name: Lightning Sword
2.description: An arming sword that has been imbued with the power of lightning. More powerful than a standard arming sword, it also allows the user to tap into their mana and unleash magical abilities.

3.name: Axe, one-handed
3.description: A one-handed battle axe. The axe's weighted head allows more power to be put into an attack.

4.name: Ice Axe, one-handed
4.description: A battle axe that has been imbued with the power of ice. The user can uase the ice axe to tap into the mana and use magical abilities

5.name: Claymore
5.description: A large sword with extra range and power.

6.name: Fire Claymore
6.description: A claymore that has been imbued with the power of fire. Allows a user to tap into their mana to use magical abilities.

7.name: Warhammer
7.description: A heavy headed hammer useful for powerful attacks, but slow to swing.

8.name: Earth Warhammer
8.description: A warhammer imbued with the power of earth. Allows users to use mana to tap into magical abilities.

10.name: Bow, Recurve
10.description: A recurve bow. Allows the user to put more energy into each shot.

12.name: Arrows, Lightning
12.description: An arrow imbued with the power of lightning.

13.name: Arrows, Ice
13.description: An arrow imbued with the power of ice.

14.name: Arrows, Fire
14.description: An arrow imbued with the power of fire.

15.name: Arrows, Earth
15.description: An arrow imbued with the power of earth.

16.name: Chain Mail
16.description: Standard guard armour. The chain links help protect against slashing and most piercing attacks.

17.name: Scale Mail
17.description: Heavier armour. Provides better protection, but hinders movement more.

18.name: Full Plate
18.description: Plate armour that covers the entire body. Offers good protection from most attack types.

19.name: Lightning Full Plate
19.description: A set of Full Plate armour imbued with lightning powers. Allows the wearer to use their mana to use magical abilities.

20.name: Ice Full Plate
20.description: A set of Full Plate armour imbued with ice powers. Allows the wearer to use their mana to use magical abilities.

21.name: Fire Full Plate
21.description: A set of Full Plate armour imbued with fire powers. Allows the wearer to use their mana to use magical abilities.

22.name: Earth Full Plate
22.description: A set of Full Plate armour imbued with earth powers. Allows the wearer to use their mana to use magical abilities.

23.name: Leather Cap
23.description: A basic leather cap. Offers some protection for the head.

24.name: Iron Helmet
24.description: A simple iron helmet. Offers better protection for the head.

25.name: Steel Helmet, Open
25.description: A simple steel helmet. Offers good protection for the head.

26.name: Steel Helmet, Closed
26.description: An enclosed steel helmet. Offers good protection for the head, face and neck.

27.name: Coins
27.description: Coins, the standard currency of the land.

28.name: Elixer of Strength
28.description: An elixer the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. It has a bitter taste, but grants a boost to strength.

29.name: Elixer of Speed
29.description: An elixer the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. It has a sweet taste, and grants a boost to speed.

30.name: Elixer of Fortitude
30.description: An elixer the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. It has a slightly sour taste, but grants a boost to fortitude.

31.name: Healing Potion, Small
31.description: A potion the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. This is the diluted version, but still very good at healing daily bumps and bruises.

32.name: Healing Potion, Large
32.description: A potion the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. This is the undiluted formula, and can heal almost any injury.

33.name: Mana Restoration Potion, Small
33.description: A potion the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. This liquid is concentrated mana, and anyone who drinks it will feel the power running through them. This is a diluted version so as not to overload the system.

34.name: Mana Restoration Potion, Large
34.description: A potion the mages whipped up in an alchemy lab. This liquid is concentrated mana, and anyone who drinks it will feel the power running through them. This is the undiluted powerful version, not meant for everyday consumption.

35.name: Tea
35.description: A brewed drink with a delicious flavour and many benefits for the drinker.

36.name: Apples, Green
36.description: Green apples. A crisp flavour and crunch.

37.name: Apples, Red
37.description: Red apples. They have a softer bite and mellower flavour.

38.name: Torches
38.description: A small light source. Can be thrown onto flammable objects to set them alit.

39.name: Buckler
39.description: A small handheld shielding device. Helps defend your hand at least.

40.name: Shield, Small
40.description: A small wooden shield, good for defence without being heavy.

41.name: Shield, Medium
41.description: An oval shaped, reinforced wooden shield, good for defence.

42.name: Shield, Tower
42.description: A large reinforced shield. Good for defence, but can hinder movement.
